title: Listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED Java Deltas
description: Bug 14113: Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED Java deltas
OB: Currently, when one changes the attached source of a JAR, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH Java delta is fired. This behavior is incorrect. As a result, the UI responds by closing the class file editors opened for this JAR. This is expected for a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH Java delta. However, when I attempted to modify the delta to be an (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta, the UI did not react as expected.
EB: In this case, I expect the system to refresh the class file editor to display the new source. To address this issue, I plan to fire a delta of (FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH | FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) and remove the FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH delta once this bug is resolved.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a class file editor for a JAR with attached source.
2. Change the attached source of the JAR.
3. Observe that a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH Java delta is fired and the class file editor is closed. This behavior is incorrect and needs to be fixed as described in the expected behavior.
